patterns.name: constant.character.escape.fish
patterns.match:
(?x)
\\[abefnrtv $\\*?#(){}\[\]<>^&|;"']
| (?# `~` and `%` only *need* to be escaped at the front of a parameter,
      but are always *treated* as escaped, even within a parameter)
\\[~%]
| (?# hex ASCII)
\\[xX][0-9A-Fa-f]{1,2}
| (?# octal)
\\[0-7]{1,3}
| (?# 16-bit Unicode)
\\u[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}
| (?# 32-bit Unicode)
\\U[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,8}
| (?# control characters)
\\c[?-~]
